Articles.Content:
Could someone take the KSPI Science Lab and make it have the same function as the stock lab, but with 3 Kerbals instead of 2?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T22:54:23Z" title="04/25/2015 10:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Laythe Dweller**

you talking about ZZZ lab part ?

EDIT- Or can you post the cfg ?

EDIT- You can open them with any text editor.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T01:55:01Z" title="04/26/2015 01:55  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
No, what I mean is that can someone with KSPI copy the Science lab and the IVA for it and edit the .cfg so it has the same function as the stock lab?
If no one can do this for me, can you at least give me a download link with the KSPI Science Lab and it's IVA?

Not sure if this is the one you are taking about [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43840-Hab-Hub-%28and-other-strange-things%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43840-Hab-Hub-%28and-other-strange-things%29) ![DQE8H7v.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/DQE8H7v.jpg)![5tquBeS.png](http://i.imgur.com/5tquBeS.png)

If so in the thread is the cfg you want.

EDIT- It's the same part has Interstellar mod has if thats what you are talking about [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-22-KSP-Interstellar-%28Science-Integration-Heat-Mechanics%29-Version-0-7-4-%28Beta%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43839-0-22-KSP-Interstellar-%28Science-Integration-Heat-Mechanics%29-Version-0-7-4-%28Beta%29)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T17:23:20Z" title="04/26/2015 05:23  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Yep, that's it. Could you post a download of just the part and the IVA? I don't want to install KSPI because it takes forever.

I did it's on top of the pic of the lab but here is a download that, I edited thinking this is what you want [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/scienceModule.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/scienceModule.zip)

EDIT- I didn't test it but it should work.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T17:49:07Z" title="04/26/2015 05:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
The part's there, but theres no IVA and Kerbals disappear when placed in it.
Whoops forgot the inside fixed try again. [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/scienceModule.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/scienceModule.zip)
Could you possibly please make it have the new science lab abilities. It changed in 1.0.

> 
> Could you possibly please make it have the new science lab abilities. It changed in 1.0.

You can try this added a couple of things [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/scienceModule.zip](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/scienceModule.zip)
Thank you so much! Have some rep.
